casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
William Thomas SMITH. No. 92P08. Supreme Court of North Carolina. April 10, 2008. William Thomas Smith, Pro Se. Christopher H. Wilson, Assistant Attorney General, Thomas J. Keith, District Attorney, for State of NC.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 27th day of February 2008 by Defendant in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 10th day of April 2008."
